title: Bounty Hamster
overview: Bounty Hamster is set in future space and its about a girl called Cassie who's father has been kidnapped by space pirates. He didn't come back for her like he said he would so she decided to go looking for him. And to help her she hired the roughest, toughest, meanest bounty hunter in the galaxy... but he was too expensive. So she ended up with a small blue hamster with one heck of an attitude and a very loud mouth. That's when her troubles really began! Together they travel through space, making new friends, and enemies, along the way!
